title: toxic a-holes
body: lately its getting to be in almost every single one of my games. just last game i got 4th pick and ended up with adc which is my worst role out of all the 5. i did badly and the mid laner belittles me so i explained to him adc is my worst role and my best role is mid laner. but he says im noob and will feed the lane no matter which lane i go(which is not true at all). what a faggit. he has to convince himself of a lie he just assumed because he is prejudiced against me and wants to feel superior than me and has to satisfy his oversized ego. i pray his account gets permanently banned and that he gets hit by a truck in real life.
